title: Andrew Cuomo pitches crypto-fueled comeback in NYC mayoral bid
contentSnippet: NYC mayoral candidate Andrew Cuomo wants to make New York City the world’s leading crypto and tech hub.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: China’s rare earth export controls to accelerate dollar collapse: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and other hard money assets are the only way to fix the economic problems caused by currency debasement, analyst Luke Gromen said.

title: Bitcoin mining just got easier — but not for long, as hashrate roars back
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's network hashrate hit an all-time high of over 1.2 trillion on Tuesday and remains elevated despite a drop in difficulty.

title: Polymarket Airdrop Farmers Have Become 'More Sophisticated' as Token Launch Looms
contentSnippet: Polymarket users have changed up their techniques for farming a potential airdrop as sources say a crypto token launch has been confirmed.

title: XRP Investor Says $3M in XRP Was Stolen; Cold Wallet Maker Says Seed Import Made Wallet Hot
contentSnippet: Long-time XRP investor Brandon LaRoque says he discovered the loss on Oct. 15 in cold wallet maker Ellipal’s mobile app, but the theft occurred on Oct. 12.

title: Crypto markets surge as Trump confirms October 31 summit with Xi Jinping
contentSnippet: The de-escalation of tensions and growing odds of a trade deal between the US and China are positive price catalysts for cryptocurrencies.

title: Professor Coin: Bitcoin, Energy and the Future of Sustainable Crypto
contentSnippet: Research into Bitcoin’s energy use has extended to mining’s total environmental cost and whether it can accelerate the green transition.

title: ‘Ether Caught Fire’: ETH Surged as Capital Fled Bitcoin in Q3, CoinGecko Report Finds
contentSnippet: ETH hit fresh highs while bitcoin cooled, as investors chased DeFi, altcoins, and tokenized assets. CoinGecko calls it a defining market shift.

title: Coinbase Institutional Highlights Three Catalysts That Could Lift Crypto in Q4 2025
contentSnippet: In a Q4 2025 outlook report, Coinbase Institutional says the cycle still skews positive — with liquidity, stablecoins and policy progress lifting the market.

title: What Is World Liberty Financial? The Trump Family DeFi Project Explained
contentSnippet: The U.S. President's biggest crypto venture is a DeFi project promising to help the unbanked. But how does it work?

title: Bitcoin weekly close must hit this $108K+ level to rescue key ‘demand area’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price volatility returned into the weekly close with a key reclaim zone in sight, while liquidations exceeded $200 million in 24 hours.

title: Stablecoins' $1 Peg Is a 'Misconception,' Says NYDIG After $500 Billion Market Meltdown
contentSnippet: The recent $500 billion crypto market sell-off revealed the instability of stablecoins, with prices fluctuating even for stablecoins.

title: XRP Setup Tightens Ahead of ETF Decisions, And $2.40 Break Could Define Next Leg
contentSnippet: Strategists warn a deeper pullback toward $1.55 remains plausible before a structural recovery attempt toward the $7–$27 corridor.

title: DOGE Holds $0.19 Base as 'Smart Money' Accumulates Ahead of Breakout Attempt
contentSnippet: Traders focus on a potential breakout above $0.192 to sustain upward momentum.

title: Don't sleep on agentic finance
contentSnippet: Ignore agentic finance and you miss how AI agents can solve crypto’s fragmented chaos by managing your assets smarter and faster than any dashboard ever could.

title: Bitcoin’s Bullish October Is Headed to Be its Worst in 10 Years
contentSnippet: The historical average for October sits around 19.8%, next to November's 42% which is the asset's strongest month.

title: It’s Time for the Crypto Industry to Take the Threat of AI and Quantum Computing Seriously
contentSnippet: If a quantum computer ever broke a blockchain, the entire crypto industry might as well close down shop, argues Kostas Chalkias, chief cryptographer at Mysten Labs.

title: Michael Saylor hints at a fresh Bitcoin purchase despite NAV collapse
contentSnippet: Michael Saylor has hinted that Strategy may buy more Bitcoin after sharing a chart showing $69 billion in BTC holdings.

title: Bitcoin Price Could Collapse to $70K or Lower as Bull Market Is Over: Elliott Wave Expert
contentSnippet: Elliott Wave expert foresees a major bitcoin bear market that could last until late 2026.

title: Can Ethereum price reclaim $4,500 in October?
contentSnippet: Ethereum price eyes $4,500 as a classic chart pattern, and onchain MVRV data align to signal renewed upside momentum this month.

title: Chinese tech giants halt Hong Kong stablecoin plans amid Beijing concerns: FT
contentSnippet: Ant Group and JD.com have paused their stablecoin initiatives in Hong Kong after Beijing regulators raised concerns over private firms issuing digital currencies.

title: XRP, SOL Break Ahead With Bullish Reset in Sentiment as Bitcoin and Ether Stay Stuck in the Gloom
contentSnippet: XRP, SOL options flash renewed bullish signal, contrasting bitcoin and ether.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ビットコイン市場回復の鍵やリップル社の事業拡大など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、BNB、XRPなどの主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: 金融庁、銀行の仮想通貨投資解禁を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: 金融庁が銀行によるビットコインなど仮想通貨の投資目的での取得・保有を可能にする制度改正を検討しているようだ。銀行グループの仮想通貨交換業者登録も可能にし、個人投資家の環境整備を図る。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜バイナンスのユーザーへの救済金配布やメタプラネットの企業価値指標低下に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、トランプ・ショックを受けた仮想通貨取引所バイナンスによるユーザー補償、メタプラネットの企業価値指標mNAVの低下に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: Wikipedia Traffic Drops as AI Answers Eat the Free Encyclopedia
contentSnippet: The Wikimedia Foundation revealed an unsettling trend: search engines and chatbots are providing Wikipedia's content directly to users without sending them to the site.

title: Circuit Breakers in DeFi? Why Experts Say Managing Chaos On-Chain Isn't That Easy
contentSnippet: Crypto prices plummeted last week as liquidations fueled historic volatility. Experts say that Wall Street’s safety net wouldn’t have helped.

title: 'Only $250K?' Jack Dorsey Prods Tether Over Donation to Support Bitcoin Devs
contentSnippet: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey previously gave $21 million to support OpenSats, which backs Bitcoin developers. Tether gave $250,000 to the nonprofit this week.

title: OneKeyが12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵脆弱性を報告、トラストウォレットに影響か
contentSnippet: ワンキーがリブビットコイン・エクスプローラー3.xの脆弱性により約12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵がクラッキング可能になると報告した。トラストウォレットなど複数の製品が影響を受けている模様。

title: オープンシーが2026年1QにSEAトークン発行予定、供給量の50%をコミュニティへ配布
contentSnippet: オープンシーCEOが2026年第1四半期のSEAトークン発行を発表した。総供給量の50%がコミュニティに配分され、収益の50%が買い戻しに使用される。ステーキング機能も実装予定だ。

title: G20、グローバルな仮想通貨規制の不足を指摘　ステーブルコインの課題も
contentSnippet: 国際的な金融監督機関FSBが、ビットコインなど仮想通貨の規制実施状況を評価する報告書を発表。各国規制の断片化と一貫性の欠如を指摘し、ステーブルコイン監督の課題も述べた。

title: 著名ユーチューバー「ミスタービースト」、仮想通貨取引所商標を申請
contentSnippet: 登録者4億4600万人のユーチューバー、ミスタービーストが仮想通貨取引やDEX運営を含む金融プラットフォームの商標を申請した。バンキングや投資サービスも提供する計画だ。

title: 決済大手ストライプ支援のL1チェーン「テンポ」、750億円を調達　イーサリアムOBが参画
contentSnippet: ストライプとパラダイムが支援する決済特化型L1ブロックチェーン「テンポ」が750億円を調達した。評価額は7,500億円に達し、著名イーサリアム開発者も参画する。

title: スイス当局、FIFAのNFTプラットフォームを違法賭博として刑事告発
contentSnippet: スイス賭博監督局がFIFAのブロックチェーン型NFTプラットフォームを違法な賭博サービスとして刑事告発した。参加に金銭的賭け金が必要で、賞金獲得が抽選で決まる仕組みが宝くじやスポーツベッティングに該当すると判断された。

title: オープンシーがNFT特化から事業転換、22チェーン対応の仮想通貨取引所に＝報道
contentSnippet: NFT市場の崩壊を経たオープンシーが、22ブロックチェーン対応のマルチチェーン仮想通貨取引アグリゲーターに転換すると報じられた。

title: Relax, That's Not a Stranger in Your House—It's Just an AI Prank
contentSnippet: A viral prank using AI-generated photos of a “homeless man” inside people’s homes has led to 911 calls, police warnings, and backlash over its cruelty.

title: Stripe's Tempo Blockchain Raises $500 Million, Poaches Prominent Ethereum Dev
contentSnippet: Dankrad Feist has left the Ethereum Foundation to help build Stripe's Tempo blockchain, which Fortune reports is now valued at $5 billion.

title: YouTube Star MrBeast Files Trademark for Crypto Exchange and Payments Service
contentSnippet: MrBeast trademarks crypto exchange app, but regulatory hurdles remain before the YouTube star can launch MrBeast Financial.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Bleed as Traders Weigh End of 4-Year Cycle
contentSnippet: Experts believe that some retail traders still follow the four-year Bitcoin cycle rulebook, accounting for part of crypto’s recent decline.
